body.name: Bling Butterfly Diamond Car Hanging Accessories, Crystal Car Rear View Mirror Charms Car Decorative Accessories for Women, Lucky Gifts Hanging Ornament Pendant Decor for All Cars (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 59 mins
features: 【Premium Material】:These butterfly car pendants are made of stainless steel chain and polymer clay with rhinestones. They are beautiful and practical decorations. It has some weight and good texture, is wear-resistant, and corrosion-resistant.
【Unique Sparkling Butterfly】:These butterfly car pendants are cute and romantic decorations that add a sparkle to any woman's car, making the car interior more charming.

【Use Size】:Butterfly car accessories have an elegant look. Suitable for all kinds of cars, the chain length is not too long or short; it will not block the view. Hang it on your car; your car will look elegant and romantic. It can be easily hung on your car's rearview mirror, perfect for daily use.

【Multi-Usage】: The sparkling butterfly pendant is suitable for hanging on your car rearview mirror as a promising piece of jewellery but also can decorate your bedroom, living room, window, office, and so on. It can also be attached to your shoulder or cross body bag, bringing you good luck and a good mood every day.

【Perfect Gift】: The Car Rearview Mirror Butterfly Pendant is a perfect accessory for both cute little girls and elegant ladies. It is a great car decoration pendant that can be gifted to parents, friends, and family on special occasions such as Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, and birthdays.
body.description: Our Rearview Mirror Crystal Pendant is made of sturdy and durable stainless steel and sparkling rhinestones, with some weight and good texture.Specification:Brand: JOYCOURTName: Rearview Mirror Butterfly PendantColor: Black/White/Pink/Red/ABMaterial: Stainless Steel, Polymer Clay, RhinestonesSize: 8.86 x 3.14 x 0.48 inchesApplicable: Most vehiclesFeatures:-It's a cute, lucky crystal car decoration. The car's interior is illuminated with sparkles when the sun hits it.-Car mirror hanging accessory for almost all cars. Universal size: don't worry about the pendant blocking your view. Easy to install, turn it on the mirror.-These charms can decorate more than car mirrors; use them to unleash creativity on bracelets, necklaces, and interiors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sparkling Elegance for Your Drive
reviews.reviewText: I recently received the Bling Butterfly Diamond Car Hanging Accessories, Crystal Car Rear View Mirror Charms, and I must say, they've added a touch of glamour to my driving experience. These charming accessories are a perfect blend of sophistication and style.The butterfly design, adorned with shimmering diamonds, catches the light beautifully, creating a dazzling effect that instantly elevates the interior of my car. The crystals are well-crafted and securely set, ensuring durability and longevity.Installation was a breeze – the accessories come with a sturdy and adjustable chain that makes it easy to hang them on the rear-view mirror. The length is just right, allowing the charms to dangle gracefully without obstructing my view while driving.Not only do these accessories add a touch of luxury to my car, but they also bring a sense of joy and positivity. The sparkling crystals reflect sunlight in a mesmerizing way, creating a serene atmosphere within the car.In terms of quality, these charms have exceeded my expectations. The materials used are of high quality, and the craftsmanship is evident in every detail. The crystals are securely attached, and the overall construction feels solid.If you're looking to enhance the aesthetic appeal of your car and bring a touch of elegance to your daily commute, the Bling Butterfly Diamond Car Hanging Accessories are a fantastic choice. They make for a great gift as well, adding a bit of sparkle to someone's daily drive.In conclusion, I am extremely pleased with my purchase, and I highly recommend the Bling Butterfly Diamond Car Hanging Accessories to anyone looking to add a dash of glamour to their car interior. Drive in style and let these charming butterflies accompany you on every journey!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bling Butterfly is the Swankiest Thing in the Room
reviews.reviewText: I actually already have one of these in my car, which is black, this newer one is a bright pink, but since I already have it for the perfect spot it needs to be in, I hung it at my workstation that I use just about every single day which means that I will get to look it every moment that I work and it will make me smile. The size is ample, the color is bright and glitzy, the chain that it comes with is useful and beautifully woven having an easy clasp at the end of it. I love this bling butterfly, I would actually get another one, no question about that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this, I thought it was a diamond painting kit. So, when it arrived, I almost sent it back, but then I noticed how it was catching the light and how pretty it looked. The butterfly is a nice size, and the chain is sturdy enough to attach it to numerous items, not just a rearview mirror. I ended up giving it to a friend who loves butterflies, and she seemed to be very happy to receive it. Great price for a simple accessory that will brighten your day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I guess no one really needs anything hanging from their rear-view mirror, but this butterfly sort of brightens my day. It is very glittery, and fairly large without blocking my view. The butterfly is a little bit puffy - 3D rather than flat. It has rhinestones on both sides. Pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This butterfly rear-view mirror ornament is absolutely stunning. it is extremely shiny and comes on a nice thick chain. It’s not so big that it obstruct your view and it shoots a little rainbows all over your car. I got the AB stone and it’s just lovely!
